qa.name: Eleanor
qa.appearance: Petite with round glasses and curly hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: As I turned the pages, memories long forgotten began to resurface.
json_to_edit.description: Eleanor discovers an old, mysterious book that seems to speak to her past.
json_to_edit.name: Whispers from the Past
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Eleanor uncovers a talking book that reveals her forgotten past.

qa.action: Eleanor enters the attic library, surrounded by towering bookshelves.

hf.action: Eleanor's hand reaches out to a peculiar, glowing book on a high shelf.

tr.action: The book's cover opens, revealing shimmering, moving text.

xc.action: Eleanor's eyes widen as she hears whispers emanating from the book.

ka.action: Eleanor's fingers trace the moving text, her expression a mix of wonder and recognition.

fn.action: The attic transforms around Eleanor, shifting to scenes from her past.

af.action: Eleanor sees herself as a child, playing in a garden she had forgotten.

qo.action: Tears form in Eleanor's eyes as she turns the pages, reliving lost memories.

fp.action: The attic returns to normal as Eleanor closes the book, forever changed by the experience.

edit_command: Add a new shot after each existing shot, showing Eleanor's emotional reaction to what she just saw. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: As I turned the pages, memories long forgotten began to resurface.
updated_json.description: Eleanor discovers an old, mysterious book that seems to speak to her past.
updated_json.name: Whispers from the Past
updated_json.scene_summary: Eleanor uncovers a talking book that reveals her forgotten past.

qa.action: Eleanor enters the attic library, surrounded by towering bookshelves.

bx.action: Eleanor's face shows a mix of curiosity and slight apprehension as she takes in the vast library.

hf.action: Eleanor's hand reaches out to a peculiar, glowing book on a high shelf.

yz.action: Eleanor's eyes widen with anticipation and a hint of fear as she grasps the glowing book.

tr.action: The book's cover opens, revealing shimmering, moving text.

lm.action: Eleanor takes a step back, her face a canvas of awe and disbelief at the magical text before her.

xc.action: Eleanor's eyes widen as she hears whispers emanating from the book.

nw.action: Eleanor's expression shifts from shock to intense concentration as she tries to understand the whispers.

ka.action: Eleanor's fingers trace the moving text, her expression a mix of wonder and recognition.

pq.action: Eleanor's body trembles slightly, her face showing a dawning realization as memories start to surface.

fn.action: The attic transforms around Eleanor, shifting to scenes from her past.

rs.action: Eleanor's eyes dart around in amazement and confusion as her surroundings change dramatically.

af.action: Eleanor sees herself as a child, playing in a garden she had forgotten.

tu.action: Tears well up in Eleanor's eyes as a bittersweet smile forms on her lips, overwhelmed by the forgotten memory.

qo.action: Tears form in Eleanor's eyes as she turns the pages, reliving lost memories.

vw.action: Eleanor wipes her tears with a trembling hand, her face a mixture of grief and joy as she continues to explore her past.

fp.action: The attic returns to normal as Eleanor closes the book, forever changed by the experience.

cd.action: Eleanor's face shows a profound sense of peace and understanding, her eyes glistening with newfound knowledge and acceptance.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot after each existing shot to show eleanor's emotional reaction to what she just saw. this will double the number of shots from 9 to 18, alternating between the original shots and new reaction shots. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots, inserting them after each existing shot. the new shots will be given random two-letter keys and will focus on eleanor's emotional responses to the events in the preceding shots.

value.action: Eleanor's face shows a mix of curiosity and slight apprehension as she takes in the vast library.

Tears well up in Eleanor's eyes as a bittersweet smile forms on her lips, overwhelmed by the forgotten memory.
Eleanor wipes her tears with a trembling hand, her face a mixture of grief and joy as she continues to explore her past.
Eleanor's face shows a profound sense of peace and understanding, her eyes glistening with newfound knowledge and acceptance.
